long_description: Bring the party to the campsite with the Stanley Adventure Flask. It holds 12 fl. oz. of your favorite beverage and has a slim profile that lets it fit easily in a pocket or backpack. Stainless-steel interior does not retain flavors or smells; rustproof exterior withstands weather and wear. Bottle opening is easy to sip and pour from; attached cap means you don't have to worry about dropping or losing it. Slim profile slides easily into a pocket or backpack. Stanley Adventure Flask measures 7 x 3.25 x 1.25 in. and holds 12 fl. oz.
short_description: Bring the party to the campsite with the Stanley Adventure Flask. It holds 12 fl. oz. of your favorite beverage and has a slim profile that lets it fit easily in a pocket or backpack.
